forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. High 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 36F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 4C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 41F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
